name: touch Karate (Universal)
description:
[Featured]
- Very simple control possible with one finger.
- The realistic motions by motion capture technology and based on physics.
- Gyro or Compass and Accelerometer provide 6-axis motion sensing.
- Retina display is supported.
- Realistic shadows by OpenGL ES 2.0.

[How to play]
Move: Touch the floor.
Attack: Tap the enemy.
